entry.name: showOnlyCurrentScreen
entry.label: Whether to show only window tasks that are on the same screen as the widget.

entry.name: showOnlyCurrentDesktop
entry.label: Whether to only show tasks that are on the current virtual desktop.

entry.name: showOnlyCurrentActivity
entry.label: Whether to show only tasks that are on the current activity.

entry.name: showOnlyMinimized
entry.label: Whether to show only window tasks that are minmized.

entry.name: showText
entry.label: Whether to show the window title when the applet is used on a horizontal panel

entry.name: showIcon
entry.label: Whether to show the icon on the Panel button

entry.name: openOnHover
entry.label: Whether to open the window list popup when hovering over the applet

entry.name: hoverOpenDelay
entry.label: Delay in milliseconds before opening the window list popup when hovering over the applet
